## Voting strategy 

I do support referendums focused on the core values of Polkadot (decentralization, democracy, interoperability, reliability), as well as referendums that are focused on brining the power of Polkadot to mass adoption (products with great UX, open source, etc). 

I do not support entities that are active against any of these values and/or human rights. 

I often express my opinion on Polkassembly, especially in the case of controversial referendums.
